Technology.Name: Xeno Linguistics
Technology.LongDescription: Spacefaring races typically possess sufficient computing and linguistic sciences to "shake hands" on a workable trade speech in a matter of minutes. But the nuance of language can be lost in this translation and there are also those rare occasions where a language is so foreign that our computers cannot decipher it at all.

UnlockedBonus.Name: Alien Language Studies
UnlockedBonus.Description: Unlocks the ability to understand truly foreign creatures that you might encounter

UnlockedBonus.Name: Xenolinguistic Nuance
UnlockedBonus.Description: A more nuanced understanding of alien languages provides a 10% bonus to diplomatic efforts
